description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on 18 May 2023 . All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive . PWGSC , on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada ( DRDC ) of Valcartier , is issuing this Request For Proposal ( RFP ) for the of a Main Inspection System ( Scanner & Software ) and a Layer removal system including delivery , training , service of maintenance and upgrade , technical support located in Quée , Canada , as specified in Annex statement of requirement .
